exact_source: During the Option Period, prior to any withdrawal, Bubalus agrees to: (a) complete a minimum of 1,200 metres of drilling on the area of EL007115; (1200 metres * 200 USD/metre = USD 240,000) and (b) complete a reconnaissance sampling program on the area of EL007370 and EL007542, ensuring expenditure commitments are met for these Tenements, as a minimum.
